ground_truth: He stares at her for a moment then lets go of the screen door and purposefully walks across the porch to embrace her. She flings her arms around him with a big smile. They sit indoors. She leaves. Daisy leans across the dining table. Benjamin carries two of Daisy's suitcases as they walk side by side through the silent shadowy corridors of the home. They enter a bedroom decorated with framed landscape paintings. Daisy puts her coat and hand back down on the double bed which has tall elaborately-carved bedposts. She closes the door and turns around. Their eyes meet across the dimly-lit room. Stepped closer and Benjamin firmly clasps her torso. Daisy arches her back slightly as their lips meet in a slow kiss. Benjamin unfastens her belt then unzips the back of her dress. She carefully rolls down her stocking, revealing a scar beneath her right knee. He slides off her dress and kisses the back of her neck. Her hand meets his as he grasps her right thigh. She turns to kiss him. Her long sleek red hair draped over one shoulder. Benjamin pulls his sweater off and climbs onto the bed as Daisy reclines, wearing a sultry black slip. A clock ticked from Queenie's old dresser. Benjamin and Daisy are silhouetted against the lilac sunset on the slowly drifting boat, the Bottomup. Benjamin looks up to see a space rocket rise over billowing mountainous clouds on the horizon. Daisy wrings out her wet hair. Benjamin playfully engulfs her in a stripy towel. They lounged together beneath palm trees on golden sands. Standing beside her on the ocean, Benjamin watches Daisy as she raises her head from the still waters. Night, they make love on the deck. They dive off the prowl of the boat as moonlight plays on the glittering surface of the sea. They swim gracefully beneath a brilliant full moon. They remained seated at the picnic branch as people flee from an advancing storm. They lie on the floor close to bed. He lies face down with his eyes closed. Daisy rests her chin against his shoulder. Lightning flashes. The wind rattles the windows. The doors rattle in the gale. Pale diaphanous drapes and close them in their bed. Daisy rolls onto her side and smiles as she gazes at him. He props himself up and looks at her. She strokes his cheek. He smiles. He inches closer. They kiss. A ceiling fan turns beneath the slipping raft over their bed. In the hospital, Caroline stares down at the diary. Looking tanned and healthy, Benjamin and Daisy carry luggage up the front steps of the retirement home. Benjamin enters ahead of Daisy to find it deserted.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Benjamin stares at Daisy, releases the screen door, and purposefully walks to embrace her. She smiles and hugs him. After sitting indoors, Daisy leaves. Benjamin carries her two suitcases as they walk silently through shadowy corridors. They enter a bedroom adorned with landscape paintings. Daisy places her coat on the bed, closes the door, and their eyes meet. Benjamin clasps Daisy, kissing her slowly. He unfastens her belt and unzips her dress. She rolls down her stocking, showing a scar, as he slides off her dress and kisses her neck. Her hand meets his on her thigh, with her long red hair over one shoulder. He removes his sweater and joins her on the bed as Daisy reclines in a sultry black slip. A clock ticks from an old dresser. They watch a rocket rise over clouds from their boat, the Bottomup. Daisy wrings her hair as Benjamin wraps her in a towel. They lounge on golden sands beneath palm trees. At night, they make love on the deck, then swim under the full moon. Seated at a picnic table, they remain as others flee from a storm. Lying close to bed, lightning flashes, and winds rattle the windows. Daisy smiles and strokes Benjamin’s cheek as they kiss. A ceiling fan turns above them. In the hospital, Caroline looks at the diary. Tanned and healthy, Benjamin and Daisy carry luggage up the steps of a retirement home, where Benjamin enters first to find it deserted.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: He stares at her intently for a moment, then releases his grip on the screen door, allowing it to swing shut behind him. With purpose in his step, he strides across the porch to warmly embrace her. She joyfully flings her arms around him, her face lighting up with a big, radiant smile. They soon find themselves seated comfortably indoors. After a while, she leaves. Daisy leans forward across the dining table, her focus intent. As they walk side by side through the silent, shadowy corridors of the home, Benjamin carries two of Daisy's suitcases. They enter a bedroom, its walls decorated with framed landscape paintings that lend an air of tranquility. Daisy places her coat and handbag on the large double bed, which boasts tall, elaborately-carved bedposts. She quietly closes the door and turns around. Their eyes meet across the dimly-lit room, filled with unspoken understanding. Stepping closer, Benjamin firmly clasps her torso. Daisy arches her back slightly, and their lips meet in a slow, lingering kiss. With gentle hands, Benjamin unfastens her belt and then carefully unzips the back of her dress. She rolls down her stocking with care, revealing a scar beneath her right knee. He slides off her dress and softly kisses the back of her neck. Her hand finds his as he grasps her right thigh, and she turns to kiss him again. Her long, sleek red hair cascades over one shoulder. Benjamin pulls off his sweater and climbs onto the bed as Daisy reclines, dressed in a sultry black slip. The steady ticking of a clock resonates from Queenie's old dresser. Benjamin and Daisy are silhouetted against the softly glowing lilac sunset as they find themselves on the slowly drifting boat, the Bottomup. Benjamin looks up to witness a space rocket ascending over billowing, mountainous clouds on the horizon. Daisy wrings out her wet hair, and Benjamin playfully envelops her in a stripy towel. Together, they lounge beneath palm trees on golden sands. Standing beside her at the ocean's edge, Benjamin watches Daisy as she gracefully raises her head from the still waters. At night, they make love on the deck, their movements synchronized with the gentle rocking of the boat. They dive off the prow of the boat as moonlight dances on the glittering surface of the sea. They swim gracefully beneath the light of a brilliant full moon. Remaining seated at the picnic branch as others flee from an advancing storm, they find solace in each other's presence. They lie on the floor close to the bed, with him lying face down and his eyes closed. Daisy rests her chin gently against his shoulder. Lightning flashes, and the wind rattles the windows as well as the doors in the fierce gale. Pale, diaphanous drapes shift as they close them against their bed. Daisy rolls onto her side, her smile soft as she gazes lovingly at him. He props himself up and looks back at her, meeting her gaze. She strokes his cheek tenderly, and he smiles back. He inches closer, and they share a sweet kiss. A ceiling fan turns slowly above the slipping raft over their bed. In the hospital, Caroline gazes down at the diary, lost in thought. Looking tanned and healthy, Benjamin and Daisy carry their luggage up the front steps of the retirement home. Benjamin enters ahead of Daisy, only to find it eerily deserted.

Daisy rolls onto her side, her smile soft and loving as she gazes at him. He props himself up to meet her gaze, and she strokes his cheek tenderly, prompting a warm smile in return. He inches closer, and together they share a sweet, tender kiss. Above them, a ceiling fan turns slowly like a slipping raft over their bed. In the hospital, Caroline is lost in thought, gazing down at the diary in her hands. Looking tanned and healthy, Benjamin and Daisy carry their luggage up the front steps of the retirement home. test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: He fixes his gaze on her momentarily, allowing a moment of quietness to pass before releasing his grip on the screen door and deliberately striding across the porch towards her, his actions filled with intention. As they embrace, she exuberantly throws her arms around him, her face alight with a big smile that radiates warmth. Transitioning indoors, they find a place to sit together and share a sense of closeness before she departs, leaving a lingering silence behind. Daisy leans forward across the dining table, perhaps in contemplation. Later, Benjamin takes hold of two of Daisy's suitcases, carrying them with a sense of purpose as they walk side by side down the silent, shadowy corridors of the home, their footsteps echoing slightly in the quiet. They enter a bedroom, its walls adorned with framed landscape paintings, giving a sense of artistry to the space. Daisy gently places her coat and handbag down on the inviting double bed, which stands out with its tall, elaborately-carved bedposts. She moves to close the door, imbuing the room with an air of privacy, and turns to face Benjamin, their eyes meeting across the dimly-lit room, creating an intimate connection. Stepping closer, Benjamin firmly places his hands around her torso, pulling her into an embrace. Daisy responds by slightly arching her back as their lips meet in a slow, tender kiss, creating a moment of deep affection. With careful hands, Benjamin unfastens her belt and begins to unzip the back of her dress, revealing the fabric beneath. Daisy rolls down her stocking cautiously, exposing a scar just below her right knee. As he slides the dress off her shoulders, he tenderly kisses the back of her neck. Their hands join again as he grasps her right thigh, further deepening their connection. She turns towards him, and they kiss once more, her long sleek red hair elegantly draped over one shoulder, adding to the allure of the moment. Benjamin swiftly removes his sweater and climbs onto the bed, positioning himself comfortably as Daisy reclines beside him in a sultry black slip. The quiet ticking of a clock drifts from Queenie's old dresser, marking the passage of time. Later, silhouetted against a stunning lilac sunset aboard the slowly drifting boat named the Bottomup, Benjamin lifts his gaze to behold a space rocket ascending over the distant billowing mountainous clouds on the horizon, capturing a moment of awe. Daisy, nearby, wrings out her wet hair, the droplets glistening as they fall. Playfully, Benjamin captures her in a stripy towel, enveloping her in its warmth as they lounge together beneath the palm trees on the golden sands. Standing beside her near the ocean, Benjamin watches intently as Daisy raises her head from the still waters, her expression serene. As night descends, they make love on the deck, their movements melding with the gentle sway of the boat beneath them. Together, they dive off the prow of the boat, their bodies slicing through the moonlit water, which shimmers like a sea of glitter. Swimming gracefully beneath the brilliance of the full moon, their movements are fluid and harmonious. Later, they remain seated at the picnic bench even as others flee in haste from the threatening storm advancing upon them. Retreating from the chaos, they lie on the floor close to the bed, finding solace in each other's presence. He rests face down, his eyes closed in a peaceful slumber, while Daisy tenderly rests her chin against his shoulder, providing a comforting presence. Lightning flashes intermittently, illuminating the room, while the wind rattles the windows with a relentless force that echoes throughout the space. The doors join in the cacophony, shaking in the gale. Attempting to create a cocoon of tranquility, they pull the pale diaphanous drapes closed around their bed. Daisy rolls onto her side, gracing him with a smile filled with affection and contentment as she gazes upon him. In response, he props himself up slightly, meeting her gaze with equal warmth. She gently strokes his cheek, a gesture filled with tenderness as he inches closer to share a kiss. Above them, a ceiling fan turns slowly, its blades slicing through the warm air, underlining the peacefulness over the slipping raft of their bed. Transitioning to the hospital, Caroline is seen staring down at the diary, its pages perhaps holding memories or secrets yet to be uncovered. Meanwhile, looking tanned and healthy, Benjamin and Daisy are portrayed as they carry luggage up the front steps of a retirement home, suggesting a new chapter in their lives. Benjamin steps inside first, anticipation turning to surprise as he discovers the space completely deserted.

He lies face down with his eyes closed. Daisy rests her chin against his shoulder. Lightning flashes. The wind rattles the windows. The doors rattle in the gale Pale diaphanous drapes and close them in their bed. Daisy rolls onto her side and smiles as she gazes at him. He props himself up and looks at her. She strokes his cheek. He smiles. He inches closer. They kiss. A ceiling fan turns beneath the slipping raft over their bed. In the hospital Caroline stares down at the diary. Looking tanned and healthy. Benjamin and Daisy carry luggage up the front steps of the retirement home. Benjamin enters ahead of Daisy to find it deserted.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: He stares at her for a moment then let us go of the screen door and purposefully walks across the porch to embrace her. She flings her arms around him with a big smile. They sit indoors. She leaves. Daisy leans across the dining table. Benjamin carries two of Daisy's suitcases as they walk side by side through the silent shadowy corridors of the home. They enter a bedroom decorated with framed landscape paintings. Daisy puts her coat and hand back down on the double bed which has tall elaboratelycarved bedposts. She closes the door and turns around. Their eyes meet across the dimlylit room. Stepped closer and Benjamin firmly clasps her torso. Daisy arches her back slightly as their lips meet in a slow kiss. Benjamin unfastens her belt then unzips the back of her dress. She carefully rolls down her stocking revealing a scar beneath her right knee. He slides off her dress and kisses the back of her neck. Her hand meets his as he grasps her right thigh. She turns to kiss him. Her long sleek red hair draped over one shoulder. Benjamin pulls his sweater off and climbs onto the bed as Daisy reclines wearing a sultry black slip. A clock ticked from Queenie's old dresser. Benjamin and Daisy are silhouetted against the lilac sunset on the slowly drifting boat. the Bottomup. Benjamin looks up to see a space rocket rise over billowing mountainous clouds on the horizon. Daisy wrings out her wet hair. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The fox glares at the tree for a second then releases the barn gate and absently skips across the garden to tickle the tree. The tree waves its branches at the fox with a wide grin. They leap outdoors. The tree arrives. Tulip stretches across the coffee table. Oliver lugs two of Tulip's umbrellas as they skip side by side through the bustling sunny alleys of the workshop. They reach a lounge adorned with printed flower sketches. Tulip tosses her hat and glove back down on the single couch which has short ornately-painted armrests. She opens the window and spins around. Their noses connect across the brightly-lit chamber. Tiptoed nearer and Oliver gently bumps her elbow. Tulip straightens her shoulder slightly as their noses touch in a rapid hug. Oliver secures her shoelace then buttons the front of her coat. She gingerly peels down her mitten, revealing a tattoo above her left elbow. He lifts off her coat and taps the front of her hat. Her toe touches his as he holds her left ankle. She shifts to hug him. Her short curly brown scarf draped over one hand. Oliver pushes his hat off and jumps onto the couch as Tulip stretches, wearing a cozy green sweater. A radio played from Zinnia's new bookshelf. Oliver and Tulip are outlined against the pink dawn on the quickly floating raft, the Upside. Oliver peers down to spot a hot air balloon descend over swirling flat plains on the skyline. Tulip shakes out her dry scarf. Oliver jokingly wraps her in a dotted blanket. They floated together beneath oak branches on silver pebbles. Sitting beside her on the pond, Oliver observes Tulip as she lowers her foot from the moving grasses. Morning, they share a meal on the bench. They climb onto the helm of the raft as sunlight dances on the shining edge of the river. They float peacefully beneath a glowing crescent sun. They remained standing at the banquet branch as creatures rush toward a receding drizzle. They stand on the ceiling far from couch. He stands nose up with his mouth open. Tulip places her foot against his hand. Thunder rumbles. The rain shakes the walls. The windows creak in the breeze. Bright translucent blinds and open them on their couch. Tulip flips onto her back and laughs as she stares at him. He lays himself down and whispers to her. She pats his ear. He laughs. He sneaks nearer. They hug. A table lamp flickers above the rotating bridge beside their couch. In the library, Violet peers up at the portrait. Looking pale and relaxed, Oliver and Tulip drag chairs down the back slope of the nursing library. Oliver leaves behind Tulip to see it crowded.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Benjamin and Daisy reunite with an embrace and share intimate moments in a dimly-lit room. They enter a bedroom adorned with landscape paintings and carved bedposts. Their relationship deepens as they kiss and undress, revealing a scar on Daisy's knee. The scene shifts to them on a boat, the Bottomup, silhouetted against a lilac sunset. They enjoy each other's company, lounging on golden sands and swimming beneath a full moon. Amidst a storm, they remain together, sharing tender moments as lightning flashes outside. In the morning, they exchange smiles and kisses under a ceiling fan. Later, Caroline finds herself reading a diary in a hospital, while Benjamin and Daisy, appearing tanned and healthy, arrive at a deserted retirement home carrying luggage.
